hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #the Water Temple#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Red Rupee#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Game Key#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Invisible Blades Invisible Chest

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the way of the hero.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Spirit Temple#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that beyond the #river in the Water Temple# waits #a Spirit Temple Small Key#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Spirit Temple Small Key#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bottom of the Well Small Key#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Water Trial Left Chest

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is a foolish choice.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find #the Ice Cavern#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Statue Room Northeast Chest

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #a Bomb Bag# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Spirit Temple Small Key#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bottom of the Well Small Key#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Huge Rupee# and #a Recovery Heart#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that ##outside Ganon's Castle## has #1# major item.

ToT (Left).text: They say that ##Hyrule Castle## has #2# major items.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that in a grotto with a #spider and a cow# you will find...^ #a Red Potion Bottle# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Forest Temple Compass#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the path to #the Key#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that the #rainbow bridge# leads to #the Bottom of the Well#.
